entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
